```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggalluvial)
library(showtext)

font_add_google("Rajdhani")
font_add_google("Lato")

showtext_opts(dpi = 320)
showtext_auto()
```


```{r}
hotels <- readr::read_csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/master/data/2020/2020-02-11/hotels.csv")
```


```{r}
hotel_booked <- hotels %>% 
  filter(is_canceled == 0) %>% 
  mutate(children = case_when(
      children + babies > 0 ~ "children",
      TRUE ~ "none"),
      required_car_parking_spaces = case_when(
      required_car_parking_spaces > 0 ~ "parking",
      TRUE ~ "none")) %>% 
  select(-is_canceled, -reservation_status, -babies)

```

```{r}
plot <- hotel_booked %>% 
  mutate(arrival_date_month = factor(arrival_date_month,
                                     levels = month.name)) %>% 
  count(hotel, arrival_date_month, children) %>% 
  group_by(hotel, children) %>% 
  mutate(proportion = n / sum(n)) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(y= proportion, axis1 = arrival_date_month, 
             axis2 = hotel)) +
  geom_alluvium(aes(fill = children))+
  geom_stratum(fill = "grey70", color = "grey20", 
               size = 0.1, width = 0.4) +
  geom_text(stat = "stratum",
            family = "Rajdhani",
            color = "gray20",
            size = 4,
            infer.label = TRUE) +
  scale_x_discrete(limits = c("Children", "Hotel"),
                   expand = c(.05, .05),
                   position = "top") +
  scale_fill_manual(values = c("#aadd33", "#99aaaa"),
                    name = "Children") +
  guides(fill = guide_legend(title.position = "top",
                               title.hjust = 0.5, 
                               label.position = "bottom")) +
  theme_void() +
  labs(x = " ",
       y = " ",
       title = "Monthly Distribution of Booking Hotels",
       subtitle = "Summer is a peak season to book hotels with children") +
  theme(legend.position = "bottom",
        legend.key.width = unit(6, "lines"),
        legend.key.height = unit(0.75, "lines"),
        legend.spacing.x = unit(0.5, 'cm'),
        legend.title = element_text(size = 10, face = "bold"),
        legend.text = element_text(size = 9),
        plot.title = element_text(family = "Rajdhani",
                                  size = 23,
                                  face = "bold",
                                  hjust = 0.5),
        plot.subtitle = element_text(family = "Lato",
                                  size = 15.5,
                                  hjust = 0.5),
        axis.text.x = element_blank(),
        axis.text.y = element_blank()) 
    
ggsave("W7_Hotelbookings.png", width = 22, height = 16, units = "cm")

```
